choices.D: It matches to the New App-IDs installed since the last time the firewall was rebooted.
choices.C: It matches to the New App-IDs downloaded in the last 30 days.
choices.A: It matches to the New App-IDs downloaded in the last 90 days.
choices.B: It matches to the New App-IDs in the most recently installed content releases.

Selected Answer: D
Active-Primary

A/A

In an active/active configuration, state of the firewall that connects to User-ID agents, runs DHCP server and DHCP relay, and matches NAT and PBF rules with the Device ID of the active-primary firewall. A firewall in this state can own sessions and set up sessions.
D is correct.

Selected Answer: D
There is no Active in an Active/Active configuration, this is only seen in an Active/Passive configuration. 
---------------
Active
A/P
State of the active firewall in an active/passive configuration. 
--------
For an Active passing traffic is Active/Primary 

------------
Active-Primary
 
A/A
 
In an active/active configuration, state of the firewall that connects to User-ID agents, runs DHCP server and DHCP relay, and matches NAT and PBF rules with the Device ID of the active-primary firewall. A firewall in this state can own sessions and set up sessions.
------

Selected Answer: D
active/active high availability

questions.question_text:
An engineer needs to configure a standardized template for all Panorama-managed firewalls. These settings will be configured on a template named "Global" and will be included in all template stacks.

Which three settings can be configured in this template? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDE
SSL decryption exclusion, Login banner, and Dynamic updates are under device tab.
Log forwarding profile is in Objects tab and Email scheduler is in Monitor tab

Selected Answer: BDE
A. Log Forwarding profile >> INCORRECT > It is located in Objects (not template related)
B. SSL decryption exclusion >> CORRECT > Located in Device
C. Email scheduler >> INCORRECT > Located in Monitor (not template related)
D. Login banner >> CORRECT > located in Located in Device / Setup
E. Dynamic updates >> CORRECT > Located in Device

Selected Answer: BDE
B, D and E correct
BDE for sure
BDE is correct

Selected Answer: CDE
Check on my firewall and panaroma 
Log Forwarding is under object
SSL Exclusion is under policy>options>No Dec.

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE correct

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE correct
BDE correct
log forwarding profile & SSL decryption both should not be in template stack

comments.content: ah, there is Device>Cert Mgmt>SSL Decrypt Exclusion indeed, but log fwding is on Objects tab, whereas Log Setting is on Device tab
